problem_names:
lemma nth_fibs:
  assumes "defined i" and "\<lbrakk> i \<rbrakk> \<ge> 0" shows "defined (fibs !! i)" and "\<lbrakk> fibs !! i \<rbrakk> = fib \<lbrakk> i \<rbrakk>"
translations: text \<open>And the proof that @{term "fibs !! i"} is defined and the fibs value.\<close>

lemma nth_fibs:
  assumes "defined i" and "\<lbrakk> i \<rbrakk> \<ge> 0" shows "defined (fibs !! i)" and "\<lbrakk> fibs !! i \<rbrakk> = fib \<lbrakk> i \<rbrakk>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. defined (fibs !! i) &&&
    \<lbrakk>fibs !! i\<rbrakk> = fib \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>

proof (prove)
using this:
  defined i
  0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. defined (fibs !! i) &&&
    \<lbrakk>fibs !! i\<rbrakk> = fib \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>

proof (state)
this:
  defined i
  0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>
  \<lbrakk>defined ?j; \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
   0 \<le> \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! ?j)
  \<lbrakk>defined ?j; \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
   0 \<le> \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! ?j\<rbrakk> = fib \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>

goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>i.
       \<lbrakk>defined i; \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk> < 0;
        0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! i)
 2. \<And>i.
       \<lbrakk>defined i; \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk> < 0;
        0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! i\<rbrakk> =
                         fib \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>
 3. \<And>i.
       \<lbrakk>defined i; 0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
        \<And>j.
           \<lbrakk>defined j; \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
            0 \<le> \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! j);
        \<And>j.
           \<lbrakk>defined j; \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
            0 \<le> \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! j\<rbrakk> =
                             fib \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>;
        0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! i)
 4. \<And>i.
       \<lbrakk>defined i; 0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
        \<And>j.
           \<lbrakk>defined j; \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
            0 \<le> \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! j);
        \<And>j.
           \<lbrakk>defined j; \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
            0 \<le> \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! j\<rbrakk> =
                             fib \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>;
        0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! i\<rbrakk> =
                         fib \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  defined i
  0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>
  \<lbrakk>defined ?j; \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
   0 \<le> \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! ?j)
  \<lbrakk>defined ?j; \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
   0 \<le> \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! ?j\<rbrakk> = fib \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>
  0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>

proof (prove)
using this:
  defined i
  0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>
  \<lbrakk>defined ?j; \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
   0 \<le> \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! ?j)
  \<lbrakk>defined ?j; \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
   0 \<le> \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! ?j\<rbrakk> = fib \<lbrakk>?j\<rbrakk>
  0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. defined (fibs !! i)
apply (subst fibs.simps, (subst fib.simps)?, simp add: nth_zipWith nth_tail)
apply (subst fibs.simps, (subst fib.simps)?, simp add: nth_zipWith nth_tail)
apply (subst fibs.simps, (subst fib.simps)?, simp add: nth_zipWith nth_tail)

proof (state)
this:
  defined (fibs !! i)

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>i.
       \<lbrakk>defined i; \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk> < 0;
        0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! i)
 2. \<And>i.
       \<lbrakk>defined i; \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk> < 0;
        0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! i\<rbrakk> =
                         fib \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>
 3. \<And>i.
       \<lbrakk>defined i; 0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
        \<And>j.
           \<lbrakk>defined j; \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
            0 \<le> \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> defined (fibs !! j);
        \<And>j.
           \<lbrakk>defined j; \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk> < \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>;
            0 \<le> \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! j\<rbrakk> =
                             fib \<lbrakk>j\<rbrakk>;
        0 \<le> \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<lbrakk>fibs !! i\<rbrakk> =
                         fib \<lbrakk>i\<rbrakk>
qed (subst fibs.simps, (subst fib.simps)?, simp add: nth_zipWith nth_tail)+
